alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 1:58AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Otero, north central Las Animas and south central Crowley Counties through 245 AM MDT... At 158 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Timpas, or 20 miles southwest of La Junta, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Timpas around 215 AM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include La Junta, Swink, Rocky Ford and Manzanola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; Eastern Las Animas County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County
